page.title: 09 TWO FAMOUS PEOPLE.
page.content: Two famous people from this area are remembered at the church of St.Peter & Paul,Stokenchurch:{Bartholomew Tipping who founded the Free School in the Parish-{The Tippings Educational {Foundation.}By a beguest in 1675,he left the sum of Â£41.0.6,annual rent on certain lands at Shabbington,Bucks,for the schooling & clothing of 12 poor children & for the apprenticeship of some others.The present Secondary school is named after him. {Hannah Ball}(1733-1792) was the founder of the first regular Sunday school in England.She became a devout Christian & follower of John Wesley. He gave her his plans for the new chapel to be built in High Wycombe and entrusted her with the building of it. She started her{Sunday school}in 1769 in a house in Queen's Square opposite Wycombe Parish Church.
